title: How find address of specific pool allocated? [closed]
content:
How find address of specific pool that allocated by specific tag

e.g. address of pool that allocated by CM7 tag?

thanks

answers_data.content: In WinDbg, you can use the !poolfind command:

comments.text: when is use !poolfind output is: Unable to get MmSystemRangeStart !!! on loop
